org.jirduino.config

Class JSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jirduino.config.JSONConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigConverter

    public class JSONConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigConverter
    Converter JSON Configuration Class, useful SignalRule table configuration storage. JSON files are stored into folder specified by ConverterDefaultSettings.JSON_FOLDER (default: data/json/convertes)
    Author:
    Emanuele Paiano
